title: Check Secondary Insurance Benefits
description: A patient has both primary and secondary insurance. A billing specialist needs to check the benefits for the secondary payer.

tasks.description: Locate the patient's record and identify their secondary insurance policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the secondary payer information in the patient's chart.

tasks.description: Submit an electronic eligibility request to the secondary payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the eligibility query.

tasks.description: Review the response to confirm the policy is active and understand the coordination of benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the secondary coverage and understands how it will apply after the primary pays.
